document_title: Vaginitis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content:
Vaginitis is a condition in which the vagina becomes infected, secreting an unpleasant odor, causing itching and pain.
Inflammatory conditions in the private area are often classified according to the cause of the disease (2):
Inflammation caused by yeast (Candida); Bacterial inflammation; Inflammation caused by Trichomonas flagellum; Inflammation caused by gonorrhea (Chlamydia); Viral inflammation; Inflammation is not contagious; Atrophic vaginitis
